title: The Case of the Caretaker's Cat
description: Erle Stanley Gardner has been cited by the "Guinness Book of World Records" as the #1 bestselling mystery writer of all time."The Case of the Caretaker's Cat" will show you why. In his will, Peter Laxter guaranteed his faithful caretaker a job and a place to live for life. Laxter's grandson Sam, one of the major beneficiaries, says the deal doesn't include the caretaker's cat. When Perry Mason takes the case, he finds there's much more at stake than an old man's cat -- a million dollars to be exact. As he investigates, he discovers a web of greed and treachery among the heirs. But which one actually pulled off an almost perfect crime?
author: Erle Stanley Gardner
